summary: No blocking implementation defects detected for the PHASE-03 marker window; one process issue occurred when the CI-auditor subagent stalled and was aborted.

issues.root_cause: The CI-auditor throwaway subagent (id 20260207-191010-ci-audit) stopped producing new log output and exceeded interactive runtime expectations.
issues.mitigation: Abort and clean the stalled subagent, preserve logs for evidence, and continue with marker-aligned retrospective report publication.
issues.prevention: Keep the CI-auditor timeout/abort guard enabled and add a preflight to constrain evidence scope when historical logs are large.
issues.evidence: Subagent status remained running with stale log age (`.agents/bin/subagent_manager.sh status --id 20260207-191010-ci-audit`), then was aborted/cleaned via `.agents/bin/subagent_manager.sh abort --id 20260207-191010-ci-audit --reason timeout` and `.agents/bin/subagent_manager.sh cleanup --id 20260207-191010-ci-audit --force`; run log captured at `/tmp/ci-audit-20260207-191010.log`.

follow_ups: Keep CI-auditor launches sequenced after committed marker/failures artifacts.
Investigate reducing CI-auditor evidence scan scope when historical session logs are large to avoid subagent stalls.
